citeinfo.origin: Earth Data Analysis Center, University of New Mexico
citeinfo.title: NM School District Boundaries

descript.abstract: The dataset represents the boundaries of all public school districts in the state of New Mexico. The source for the data layer is the New Mexico Public Education Department School District Boundary Atlas.
descript.purpose: The data was prepared to identify school district boundaries.
descript.supplinf: The digital 2000 Census TIGER (Topologically Integrated Geographic Encoding and Referencing)/Line file was used a digital starting point. This digital layer was updated and corrected with information provided by the New Mexico Public Education Department School District Boundary Atlas.

theme.themekey: polygon, school, district, unified, school district, school districts, unified schools, unified school districts, unified school district, code, district code

idinfo.useconst: New Mexico Public Education Department assumes no liability for the misuse of the data. Data should be used at the scale for which it is intended. Data Disclaimer - This geospatial data is made available as a public service. The geospatial data in this map is in the public domain and may be copied without permission provided that an accompanying citation to the source (New Mexico Public Education Department) is made. The map itself is unofficial and the information contained in the map is offered only to assist in locating, identifying, and inventorying parcels of land in New Mexico in reference to school districts. As such, it should not be construed or used as a legal description or for any other purposes requiring accurate school boundary, property or other land descriptions or measurements. Any errors or omissions in or recommendations for improving the map should be reported to the New Mexico Public Education Department ("NMPED"). The NMPED assumes no responsibility for improper reliance on this map. Maps and data are to be used for reference purposes only and the New Mexico Public Education Department is not responsible for any inaccuracies herein contained. No responsibility is assumed for damages or other liabilities due to the accuracy, availability, use or misuse of the information herein provided. This geospatial data is in the public domain and may be copied without permission; citation of the source is expected. Map information is believed to be relatively accurate but accuracy is not guaranteed. Any errors, omissions, or recommendations should be reported to the New Mexico Public Education Department. In no event will the New Mexico Public Education Department be liable for any damages or loss that might arise from the use of these maps and data or the information they contain.
idinfo.datacred: This data set is the product of collaboration between the New Mexico Public Education Department (NMPED), the Earth Data Analysis Center (EDAC) at the University of New Mexico, the New Mexico Taxation and Revenue Department and Public Service Company of New Mexico(PNM).
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

citeinfo.title: New Mexico Public Education Department School District Boundary Atlas

procstep.procdesc: Starting with the base 2000 census TIGER shapefile the school district boundaries were updated to match the district boundaries from the 1997 NMPED School District Boundary Atlas. The atlas was produced in 1997 from GIS data obtained from the RGIS program and data from the NM Department of Education by the NM General Services Department, Information Systems Division.

cntperp.cntorg: Earth Data Analysis Center, University of New Mexico

distinfo.distliab: The material on this site is made available as a public service. Maps and data are to be used for reference purposes only and the Earth Data Analysis Center (EDAC), Resource Geographic Information System (RGIS) and The University of New Mexico are not responsible for any inaccuracies herein contained. No responsibility is assumed for damages or other liabilities due to the accuracy, availability, use or misuse of the information herein provided. Unless otherwise indicated in the documentation (metadata) for individual data sets, information on this site is public domain and may be copied without permission; citation of the source is appreciated.
